abstract: If you weren’t thrilled by the regular Kindle, then the new, supersized Kindle DX isn’t going to change your mind.
snippet: If you weren’t thrilled by the regular Kindle, then the new, supersized Kindle DX isn’t going to change your mind.
lead_paragraph: From a reviewer's perspective, the Amazon Kindle is one of the weirdest, most polarizing gadgets ever to come down the pike. I mean, people who love it, love it. People who don't get it, *really* don't get it.

headline.main: The Kindle DX: Bigger, but With a Lot of Footnotes
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
